title: If I were to publish a book series, each having 100 pages, would it be considered a children's book series? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends upon your genre and content. Dark short stories can also be wrottin within a hundred pages, content is what matters. You could call then novellas, or just novels. There should be some term for this. I'm sorry I'm not familiar with it. All I know is it will not be considered as a children's book series.
